title: Left 4 Dead 2 v2.1.3.4 MP-SP-=AviaRa=-
description:
Games : Windows : Full Game : English


This version of Left 4 Dead 2 is 2.1.3.4,just install the game and you ready to play on cracked servers
Multiplayer Online from Server Browser - Custom tab
or Single Player from Main Menu.


If your Video Card is older ,open game,go to Options ,Video ,Advanced and set to low or disabled.

With this version you can play only ON CRACKED SERVERS ,anyway on Find Servers (Custom tab) menu you can find only cracked servers.

VALVE IS UPDATING PERIODICALY L4D2 ,IF YOU CANNOT CONNECT TO UPDATED SERVERS,
VISITAND TAKE THE UPDATE PATCH.


DO NOT TRY TO PLAY THIS GAME WITH STEAM APPLICATION OPENED ,CLOSE (LOGOUT) STEAM THEN RUN THIS GAME !!!!

"OPEN SERVER BROWSER - You'll find Servers to play in the Custom-Tab."
"IF GAME IS NOT EXITING FROM QUIT BUTTON TYPE quit IN CONSOLE"
"Not see button "Server Browser ??" - type in console "openserverbrowser" ,on Custom "tab" you find servers to play

If you want to play with your friends just create a server with our internet/lan server creators(You can finde them on your desktop)
-L4D2-Create Lan Server-=AviaRa=-
-L4D2-Create Internet Server-=AviaRa=-

How to install:

Open Setup.exe-=AviaRa=-, follow the installer steps and play from desktop shortcuts
